quest.70A09D5CFC69EA43.title: Welcome To &6Oceanblock 2&r!
quest.70A09D5CFC69EA43.quest_desc1: A vast endless ocean... something stirs deep beneath the surface.
quest.70A09D5CFC69EA43.quest_desc5: &6Oceanblock 2&r is a progression-based pack that takes you through the deepest parts of the ocean.
quest.70A09D5CFC69EA43.quest_desc7: You spawn in the &aLobby&r! To start your adventure, head through the portal and choose your starting ship.
chapter.061E43DCC3E0E302.title: Welcome
task.7F7994DE4B55D7F6.title: Welcome To &6Oceanblock 2&r
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.title: Useful Commands
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc1: &a/sethome&r - Sets a &eHome&r for you to teleport back to. This cannot be set below crushing depths.
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc5: &a/ftbteambases home&r - Teleports you back to your &ePod Spawn Location&r.
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc7: &a/back&r - Teleports you back to your last death location.
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc11: Note: Using &a/back&r to get to another dimension will still have the item requirements that are needed to enter the dimension.
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc19: This pack comes with several new types of &aResource Packs&r!
quest.2DAA24C99CAB703D.quest_desc21: These can easily be enabled or disabled in your &bOptions&r.
task.5A2372373A4356E2.title: Commands
